heroTitle: CliffRise is a way to give something back to the cliffs that give us so much - with every purchase supporting the creation of new routes and the care of climbing areas in Bulgaria.

dryChalk.name: Dry Chalk 250g
dryChalk.description: Premium pure magnesium carbonate for superior grip and performance.
features: Suitable for dry or wet skin

wetChalk.name: Wet Chalk 250g
wetChalk.description: Premium pure magnesium carbonate for superior grip and performance.
features: Suitable for dry or wet skin

chalkBall.description: Convenient chalk ball for mess-free application during climbs.
features: Perfect for gym and rock climbing

liquidChalk.name: Liquid Chalk
liquidChalk.description: Advanced liquid chalk formula that dries quickly for lasting grip.

tshirt.name: Cliffrise T-Shirt

hat.name: Cliffrise Hat
hat.description: Adjustable climbing hat with embroidered CliffRise logo.

eventsSection.normalTextOne: it was a weekend full of climbing, smiles, and time outdoors. Climbing during the day, yoga, and meeting cool people, sharing stories and ideas - all against the backdrop of beautiful Teteven. An event that showcased
eventsSection.boldedTextTwo: how strong and vibrant the climbing community is
eventsSection.normalTextTwo: and left a desire for this to be just the beginning.

contactForm.description1: We develop climbing routes and maintain climbing areas.
contactForm.description2: If you’d like to get involved, support the work, or simply ask a question, write to us and we’ll get back to you.
